title: 牌子锁插件问题大神来
author: a1361181407
txt_content: 请问怎么设置牌子锁插件op无视锁

replies.author: OVAmach
replies.txt_content:
LWC？
/manuaddp playername lwc.admin          #playername为你想设置无视锁权限的玩家复制代码

replies.author: a1361181407
replies.txt_content:
OVAmach 发表于 2014-9-13 12:03
LWC？
没用啊 是locketta插件

replies.txt_content:
